scenes.background: You suggest finding another solution without involving you. Bob responds:
scenes.description: This is a bit disappointing. Can you reconsider your stance?

options.text: I understand your frustration, but I need to prioritize my leave. Can someone else step in?
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and perception but slightly lower empathy and motivation, maintaining boundaries while acknowledging the situation.

options.text: I’m willing to help a bit more but can't commit fully. What’s the most critical part?
options.analysis: You demonstrate empathy and willingness to assist, but self-regulation is compromised as you offer to help despite being on leave.

options.text: I’ve made my decision. Please respect my time off and find another solution.
options.analysis: You maintain strong boundaries and self-regulation, but emotional perception and empathy are lower as you firmly decline further involvement.
